data.title: • Wii News & Updates

data.text:
› updated wii-kly, virtual console, nintendo ds, new releases..

Hello fellow Wii buddies!

Here I'll be posting up any news and updates on Nintendo's newly successful system titled Wii (and DS).

I do weekly posts mostly on new releases of classic games (from NES, SNES, N64, Sega Genesis, TurboGrafix16, etc.) on the Virtual Console located within the Wii Shop Channel.

So basically, I'm just copying and pasting from my Wii blog to here and other forums. \:D/

Also, I hope I'm allowed to double post multiple times because judging from the activity in this forum, I've got a feeling some times there won't be a reply after my last post. So the following post will be the latest news I wrote last Monday.

----------------

Well I guess this forum doesn't support double posting, Instead it auto-adds the 2nd post to the previous post making its format very compressed. Anyway, continue on to my post..

----------------

^ Which is today!

Mario Strikers Charged is available in stores today (online stores tomorrow). It's the second online Wii game to be released outside Japan.

Wiki: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mario_Strikers_Charged

------------------

Now it's time for our weekly Virtual Console updates. Today we have the following available in the Wii Shop:

Star Soldier

NES

1 player

Rated E for Everyone

Mild Fantasy Violence

500 Wii Points

Wiki: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Star_Soldier

Dynamite Headdy

Sega Genesis

1 player

Rated E for Everyone

Comic Mischief

800 Wii Points

Wiki: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dynamite_Headdy

Drop Off

TurboGrafx16

1 player

Rated E for Everyone

600 Wii Points

Wiki: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drop_Off

------------------

Super Smash Bros Brawl's official website, Smash Bros DOJO, updates us with a new assist trophy character, Knuckle Joe:

he does the Vulcan Jab..

then ends with either Smash Punch or Rising Break.

also they've revealed DK's Final Smash move:

-----------------

Geometry Wars Galaxies boxarts for Wii + DS

As you can see, the little blue WiFi logo indicates they're compatible with Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.

Features include:

# All New Controls - Pull off hotshot moves with controls optimized for the Wii and DS.

# All New Single-Player Campaign - Choose which solar system you’ll save first. Then pick back up where you left off, if you can ever put it down!

# All New Multiplayer – Join together for co-op play or settle rivalries on the Nintendo Wii online leader boards.

# Wii and DS Linked Content – Link the DS and Wii versions to unlock bonus content and be on exclusive leaderboard rankings.

-----------------

Well, that's all for today, I'm hungry now. But if you are planning on getting Mario Strikers Charged, be sure to drop off your Friend Codes so we can battle one another. \:D/

// Roth
